title: Fix Admin Portal Visibility and Apply Neon Dark Black-and-Green Theme

requirements.summary: Ensure the admin portal is fully accessible and visible with correct routing, authentication guard logic, and session handling
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to /admin-login renders the login form
Logging in with admin/admin123 redirects to /owner-dashboard
All admin sub-routes render their respective pages without redirecting to login when session is active
AdminLayout sidebar is visible on all admin pages with links to all modules

file_operations.description: Review and verify that all admin routes are correctly registered: /admin-login as standalone, and all admin sub-routes (/owner-dashboard, /admin/stock, /admin/sales, /admin/revenue, /admin/customers, /admin/enquiries, /admin/income, /admin/trending, /admin/products, /admin/reports) are nested under AdminGuard and AdminLayout. Ensure no route definitions are missing or misconfigured that would prevent admin pages from rendering.

Fix the authentication guard logic to correctly read both 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive' keys from sessionStorage. Ensure that when both keys are present and valid, the guard renders the Outlet without redirecting. When either key is missing or invalid, redirect to /admin-login. Add proper checks to prevent infinite redirect loops for authenticated users.

Verify that on successful login with admin/admin123, both 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive' are set in sessionStorage (and localStorage if 'remember me' is checked) before navigating to /owner-dashboard. Ensure the redirect logic uses the router's navigate function correctly.

Ensure the sidebar navigation renders all required admin route links: Owner Dashboard, Stock Management, Sales, Revenue, Customers, Enquiries, Income, Trending, Products, and Reports. Verify the sidebar is visible on both desktop and mobile, and that the logout handler clears both 'admin-session' and 'adminSessionActive' from sessionStorage/localStorage before navigating to /admin-login.

requirements.summary: Apply and enforce a neon dark black-and-green theme consistently across all pages using CSS custom properties and Tailwind config tokens
acceptanceCriteria: Application background is near-black on all pages
Neon green is used consistently for accents, buttons, links, and highlights across admin and public pages
Cards and panels have dark surfaces with visible neon glow or border effects
No default light or blue theme remnants are visible anywhere
Tailwind config neon color tokens are correctly defined and referenced in components
CSS custom properties in index.css reflect the neon dark palette for both light and dark mode tokens

file_operations.description: Update all CSS custom properties to enforce the neon dark theme. Set background tokens to near-black (#0a0a0a or #0d0d0d), foreground to light gray or white, primary/accent colors to bright neon green (#00ff88 or #39ff14), card/popover backgrounds to dark surfaces (e.g., #1a1a1a), and border colors to muted dark tones with optional neon highlights. Apply these tokens to both :root and .dark selectors to ensure consistency. Remove or override any conflicting light or blue theme values.

Define or update neon dark color tokens in the extend.colors section: set 'neon' or 'primary' to bright neon green shades (#00ff88, #39ff14, with hover/active variants), 'background' to near-black (#0a0a0a, #0d0d0d), 'foreground' to white or light gray, 'card' to dark surface (#1a1a1a), and 'border' to muted dark with optional neon accents. Ensure these tokens replace any default light or blue color definitions and are globally available for use in all components.

Apply neon dark theme styling to the admin login page: use near-black background, neon green for the submit button and focus states, dark card surface for the login form container, and ensure all text is light-colored for readability. Remove any light or blue theme remnants.

Apply neon dark theme to the owner dashboard: use near-black page background, dark card surfaces for stat cards, neon green accents on borders or icons, and light text. Ensure all clickable cards have neon glow or hover effects.

Apply neon dark theme to the stock management page: use near-black background, dark surfaces for tables and forms, neon green for action buttons (Add, Edit, Delete), and neon borders or glow effects on interactive elements. Ensure text is light-colored.
Apply neon dark theme to the sales page: use near-black background, dark card surfaces for today's sales panel, neon green accents on headings and key metrics, and light text throughout.
Apply neon dark theme to the revenue page: use near-black background, dark surfaces for revenue cards and tables, neon green for highlights and borders, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the customer management page: use near-black background, dark surfaces for customer cards and forms, neon green accents on tabs and action buttons, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the enquiry management page: use near-black background, dark table surfaces, neon green for tab highlights and active states, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the income page: use near-black background, dark card surfaces for income cards, neon green accents on headings and key figures, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the trending page: use near-black background, dark product card surfaces, neon green borders or glow effects on trending items, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the product management page: use near-black background, dark table and form surfaces, neon green for action buttons and toggles, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the sales reports page: use near-black background, dark surfaces for summary cards and report tables, neon green accents on tabs and export buttons, and light text.
Apply neon dark theme to the admin dashboard: use near-black background, dark navigation card surfaces, neon green borders or glow effects on hover, and light text for all card labels and icons.

Apply neon dark theme to the home page: use near-black background, neon green accents on hero headings and CTAs, dark surfaces for trust indicator cards, and light text. Ensure the hero section uses neon glow effects on key elements.
Apply neon dark theme to the products page: use near-black background, neon green accents on placeholder text or links, and light text.

Apply neon dark theme to the About Us page: use near-black background, dark card surfaces for the story section and core values grid, neon green accents on icons or headings, and light text throughout.

Apply neon dark theme to the contact page: use near-black background, dark form surface, neon green for submit button and focus states, and light text. Ensure the map section integrates with the dark theme.

Apply neon dark theme to the admin layout sidebar: use near-black or very dark background for the sidebar, neon green for active/hover link states, dark surfaces for the mobile menu overlay, and light text for all navigation links. Add subtle neon glow effects to active navigation items.

Apply neon dark theme to the public layout header: use near-black header background, neon green for logo or brand name, neon accents on nav links with glow on hover, and light text. Ensure the mobile menu overlay also uses the dark neon theme.

Apply neon dark theme to the trending products section: use dark card surfaces for product cards, neon green borders or glow effects on hover, light text for product names and prices, and neon accents on the enquiry link.
Apply neon dark theme to the trending stocks panel: use dark card surfaces, neon green accents on borders or labels, and light text for product details.
Apply neon dark theme to the today's sales panel: use dark surfaces for stat cards and transaction table, neon green accents on key metrics and headings, and light text throughout.
Apply neon dark theme to the revenue overview: use dark card surfaces, neon green accents on revenue figures and borders, and light text for all labels and table content.
Apply neon dark theme to the income tracking component: use dark card surfaces for income cards, neon green accents on headings and key figures, and light text for all content.
Apply neon dark theme to the low stock warning banner: use a dark alert background with neon green border or icon, light text for the warning message, and neon green for the action link.

Apply neon dark theme to the stock item form dialog: use dark dialog background, dark input field surfaces, neon green for submit button and focus states, light text for labels and placeholders, and neon border accents.

Apply neon dark theme to the profile setup modal: use dark modal background, dark input field surface, neon green for the submit button, light text for headings and labels, and neon border on focus states.
